price: Na ambao wanazitimiza amana zao na ahadi zao!
footnotes: Na (hao Waumini) wawe ni wenye kuhifadhi kila walicho pewa kuwa ni amana, ikiwa mali au neno au kitendo au chenginecho, na watimize kila ahadi iliyo baina yao na Mwenyezi Mungu au na watu. Wasikhuni amana, wala wasivunje ahadi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
